section.title: Global Variables
section.para: Global variables are variables available to any Portfile. For a list of additional variables available to ports that are assigned to a MacPorts Portgroup, see portgroup(7).
All of these variables except prefix are read-only!

listitem.para: Installation prefix, set at compile time and displayed in ${prefix}/etc/macports/macports.conf â€”- may be overridden on a per-port basis, for example to install into a wholly-contained subdirectory of ${prefix}, but most ports should have no reason to do so.
Default: /opt/local
